{"id":1163513553,"question_id":724,"lang":"python","lang_name":"Python","time":"11Â months","timestamp":1706842016,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"111 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1163513553/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"13 MB","code":"class Solution(object):\n    def pivotIndex(self, nums):\n        \"\"\"\n        :type nums: List[int]\n        :rtype: int\n        \"\"\"\n        sum_left = []\n        sum_right = []\n        add = 0\n        add_1 = 0\n        result = -1\n        for i in range(0, len(nums)):\n            add += nums[i]\n            sum_left.append(add)\n        for i in range(len(nums)-1, -1, -1):\n            add_1 += nums[i]\n            sum_right.append(add_1)\n        sum_right = sum_right[::-1]\n        for i in range(len(nums)):\n            if sum_left[i] == sum_right[i]:\n                result = i\n                break\n        return result\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
